This app needs access to your notifications. Click OK and then check the box.
If off, the app will not try to send notifications to the server
Select the apps that are allowed to send notifications
Automatically look for Cinnotify servers on this network
This will send your messages securely to your PC, preventing snoopers from reading them. This is strongly recommended.
Cinnotify can\'t send a test notification. Make sure that the Listener is enabled in Settings, and that Cinnotify is an allowed app in the \'Allowed Apps\' setting
